user_query: I'm organizing a music competition and I need a variety of tracks to play during the event. Search for tracks on Soundcloud and provide me with the download links. Also, suggest a playlist and an artist from Deezer that can inspire the participants.

TaskList.description: Search for a variety of music tracks on Soundcloud based on specific genres or themes relevant to the competition.
Collect and provide download links for the tracks found on Soundcloud.
Search for playlists on Deezer that are related to the competition theme.
Suggest an artist from Deezer who is relevant to the music competition genre.
Compile all the information (download links, playlist, and artist) into a comprehensive document for distribution.
